name: BIRD SEED
description:
CREDIT: https://managore.itch.io/ for font

Made for GBJAM 8. Inspired by Balloon Fight, especially Balloon Trip - even if I realised (clearly) that the controls were more like Flappy Bird... This jam was fun, and gave me a reason to release something!

I wanted to make a game that felt like one you'd play on a taxi or bus ride on the Game Boy, so nothing too complex. I actually never had a pure Game Boy - my first console was a Game Boy Color - but even so, I hope you enjoy this attempt to prod at nostalgia. (I am aware the score font alias-es a little, and I could not figure out how to fix it. My apologies.)
